full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MCHOG TSANGS PA CHEN PO ZHI DRAG GI GTOR 'BUL, LHA MCHOG DRAG PO BSE KHRAB CAN GYI GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL, CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN LAS BCOL RNAMS BZHUGS SO, , ` DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO LA GSER SKYEMS GTOR 'BUL TSUL GTOR 'BUL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,LHA MCHOG TSANGS PA CHEN PO ZHI DRAG GI GTOR 'BUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI SNGAGS GRAS RGYA GLING SBYONG MI RNAMS KYIS LHA MCHOG TSANGS PA ZHI DRAG LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,)
